</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the collective pitch control to a specific position, regardless of input devices (until those are changed).
* 0: collective fully down
* ~0.7: approximate stable hover position
* 1: collective fully up 
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature AFM</title></template></value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> helicopterRTD [[setActualCollectiveRTD]] value</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> helicopterRTD : [[ObjectRTD]] - helicopter </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> value: [[Number]] - collective position </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myHelicopterRTD [[setActualCollectiveRTD]] 0.7;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[collectiveRTD]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
